mapper.insert: insert into DZBJJBXXB (GQPBH, GQPMC, SSSS, SSQX, PG, PC, MJ, QPLX, AQDJ) values (#{gqpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gqpmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssqx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pg,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pc,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{mj,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{qplx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aqdj,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update DZBJJBXXB set GQPMC = #{gqpmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SSSS = #{ssss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SSQX = #{ssqx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PG = #{pg,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PC = #{pc,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, MJ = #{mj,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, QPLX = #{qplx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AQDJ = #{aqdj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where GQPBH = #{gqpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select GQPBH, GQPMC, SSSS, SSQX, PG, PC, MJ, QPLX, AQDJ from DZBJJBXXB
